document_data.name: First Shrine of the Queen of Air
document_data.mainbody: The mound of the '''First Shrine of the Queen of Air''' was the holiest site for followers of [[Akadi]], the Lady of the Winds.
document_data.Location: The shrine was located in the ruins of [[Blaskaltar]] on the open plains of the western [[Shaar]].
document_data.Description: The shrine was a neglected ruin as of the {{YearlinkName|1367}}.
document_data.Activities: Akadi's faithful gathered at the shrine on a yearly basis during [[Midsummer]] to remember their [[Church of Akadi|church's]] history and those who served it. They did this in order to avoid repeating the mistakes of the past so as not to doom their future. New names were added to the roll at this time commemorating those of the clergy who passed on during the year.
